OctaDist

A tool for calculating distortion parameters in coordination complexes.

View the Project on GitHub OctaDist/OctaDist.github.io

back to homepage

Download

Stable release

The latest stable release of OctaDist is available for following OS and platforms:

Platform Stable version
Windows OS OctaDist-2.6.1 (exe) / (zip)
Linux OS OctaDist-2.6.1 (tar.gz)
macOS OctaDist-2.6.1 (tar.gz)
PyPI pip install octadist
Anaconda conda install -c rangsiman octadist

Nightly development build

An on-going development build can be downloaded at Dev-build (zip). To install it on your system via pip, use following command:

pip install https://github.com/OctaDist/OctaDist/archive/nightly-build.zip

See Development for more details.

All version release

The source code and executable of all version and release note can be found at Release archives.

System requirements

  • Windows 7/8/10
  • Linux (X Start)
  • OS X 10.8+ and macOS 10.12+
